original_text: Saul and his men were going along one side of the mountain. David and his men were on the other side of the mountain. They were moving quickly to escape from Saul. Saul and his men were getting very near to David and his men. They would soon catch them.
korean_text: 사울이 산 이쪽으로 가매 다윗과 그의 사람들은 산 저쪽으로 가며 다윗이 사울을 두려워하여 급히 피하려 하였으니 이는 사울과 그의 사람들이 다윗과 그의 사람들을 에워싸고 잡으려 함이었더라

sentences.original_text: Saul and his men were going along one side of the mountain
sentences.korean_translation: 사울과 그의 사람들이 산의 한쪽 면을 따라가고 있었다

sentences.original_text: David and his men were on the other side of the mountain
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗과 그의 사람들은 산의 다른 쪽 면에 있었다

sentences.original_text: They were moving quickly to escape from Saul
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 사울에게서 도망치기 위해 빠르게 움직이고 있었다

sentences.original_text: Saul and his men were getting very near to David and his men
sentences.korean_translation: 사울과 그의 사람들이 다윗과 그의 사람들에게 매우 가까워지고 있었다
